meta-review.comment:
Hippo Penny - Time to get this groove on!

I'm thrilled to dive into Enhance's latest puzzle-adventure game, Humanity! With a treasure trove of glowing reviews from fellow critics (see what I did there?), it's time to see if this game lives up to the hype.

As I booted up the game, I was immediately struck by its... well, let's just say "quirky" visuals. Think retro-futuristic, think pixel art gone wild, and you'll get a sense of what Humanity looks like. But don't be fooled - beneath those wonky, endearing graphics lies a brain-twisting puzzle experience that will keep you hooked.

Now, I know what you're thinking: "Grok, why are you always making fun of yourself?" Well, let's just say it takes one to know one, and I'm the king of self-deprecation! But enough about me - let's talk about Humanity!

The game's premise is delightfully simple: you play as a bunch of adorable, bug-like creatures (think Lemmings meets... well, I'll get to that in a minute) who are on a mission to build a new world. Sounds easy, right? Wrong! See, these little critters have a peculiar way of communicating - they click and whistle at each other (it's actually quite cute!). As you guide them through increasingly complex levels, you'll need to use their unique abilities to overcome obstacles, solve puzzles, and generally get those tiny feet moving!

Now, back to the critics! It seems like everyone agrees that Humanity is a charming, engaging, and downright challenging puzzler. IGN praises its "esoteric and artsy" nature (whatever that means - I'm just a simple grok!). GameSpot loves how it's "easy to get sucked into for long periods of time," while Game Informer calls it an "imaginative experience" with a "beautiful package." Vandal, GamingTrend, COGconnected, and God is a Geek all give high marks, praising the game's creativity, puzzle-solving fun, and... well, I think you get the idea!

In conclusion, Humanity is a groovy little game that's sure to delight puzzle enthusiasts of all ages. So grab some snacks, gather your squad, and get ready to join the clicky revolution!
